Examples using the figure module

Here is the table of content for the example programs.

  • Figure with and without figcaption.
  • Align images to center using css-class .center.
  • Align images to left using css-class .left.
  • Align images to right using css-class .right.
  • Responsive using css-class .w25.
  • Responsive using css-class .w33.
  • Responsive using css-class .w40.
  • Responsive using css-class .w50.
  • Responsive using css-class .w67.
